name: PEEPAW
description:
Help!  Peepaw was messin’ around with the Ouija Board and got possessed again!  Help us find Meemaw and escape!

“Peepaw” is a side-scrolling horror game where you must escape the dark house from Peepaw and the various ghosts and demons he unwittingly summoned!  Will you be able to find Meemaw and escape alive?

But wait you’re not alone!  Your cousins are scattered around the house and finding them will grant you some useful upgrades!

Better played in the dark with headphones!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Pick up/Use Items
